meanings.definition: The quality of being extremely pleasing or successful.
meanings.sent1: Her fabulousness in organizing events always impresses everyone.
meanings.sent2: The fabulousness of the party decorations left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The fabulousness of her baking skills made her the star of the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The fabulousness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The fabulousness of the dance performance was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being extraordinary or remarkable.
meanings.sent1: The fabulousness of his magic tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The movie's fabulousness captured the hearts of many viewers.
meanings.sent3: The fabulousness of the talking dog in the show brought laughter to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The fabulousness of the mountain view took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The fabulousness of the singer's voice echoed through the concert hall.
